title: I think if you have over 10 deaths in a ranked game...
body: It should be seen as intentionally feeding. Even if you are getting shit on in lane you shouldn't die 10 times within 30 minutes.

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/a/esS6o
Look what I found. OP died 10 times in 28 minutes in a Ranked. Rito please ban this guy for intentional feed.

edit: loooooool at the 1 pink ward bought as a support in 28 minutes hahahahhahahahaa
